content:
List of items in the block sent to the listserv, but anyone with JIRA access can review here:
https://jira.hl7.org/issues/?filter=13081
@Kevin Power this takes me to an invalid page when I use link... user issue or a problem with link?
Do you have a username for JIRA @Arthur Hermann ? You should get prompted to sign in when you click the link ?

yes @Kevin Power - I did have a valid log-in but something has happened.. I tried to get an reset email but it didn't arrive. I don't have time at the moment to troubleshoot. I will simply look for your listerve email with the block vote info.. thanks

@Arthur Hermann - I have found the #JIRA/Confluence stream to be very helpful for troubleshooting issues with JIRA and Confluence. You might start there.

Hopefully you found the email with the items in the block vote, let me know if you didn't.
Thanks @Kevin Power - simple question: do Confluence and Jira have separate log-ins?
